testcase.name: verifying user details with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on hotel page.................................................passed When i should enters "vidhyaes" and "vid@98"................................passed And i should click the login button.........................................passed And i should enter "London" and "HotelCreek" and "<Roomtype>" and "1 - One" and "04/07/2020" and "09/07/2020" and "1 - One" and "1 - One".passed And i should click search button............................................passed And i should enter payment deatils "vidhya" and "E" and "Adyar" and "1234567891012345" and "<creditcardtype>".passed And i should enter card details "May" and "2022"............................passed And i should enter "<cvvno>"................................................passed And i should click booknow button...........................................passed And get orderno.............................................................passed Then user should verify message.............................................passed
